Shareholder Name: Salman Mohamed Hassan Abdullah Al Jishi

Description: National Gas and Industrialization Co (known as: Gasco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Gasco operates within the Utilities sector focusing on Gas Utilities. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Gasco is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1963.
